languages.text: "Смерть — это Милость Императора, которую надо заслужить. Позволь мне обратить его в корабельного сервитора. Так он научится послушанию".

traits.locale_text: "Смерть — это Милость Императора, которую надо заслужить. Позволь мне обратить его в корабельного сервитора. Так он научится послушанию".

languages.text: "Death is the Emperor's Peace, and it must be earned. Let me turn him into a servitor on my ship. That will teach him obedience."
languages.original_text: "Смерть — это Милость Императора, которую надо заслужить. Позволь мне обратить его в корабельного сервитора. Так он научится послушанию".

traits.locale_text: "Death is the Emperor's Peace and it must be earned. Let me turn him into a servitor on my ship. That will teach him obedience."
"Death is the Emperor's Peace and it must be earned. Let me turn him into a servitor on my ship. That will teach him obedience."
"Death is the Emperor's Peace, and it must be earned. Let me turn him into a servitor on my ship. That will teach him obedience."

"Death is the Emperor's Peace, and it must be earned. Let me turn him into a servitor on my ship. That will teach him obedience."
"Death is the Emperor's Peace, and it must be earned. Let me turn him into a servitor on my ship. That will teach him obedience."

languages.text: “死亡是帝皇赐予的安宁，只有努力争取才能得到。我会把他改造成机仆，让他在我的船上服役，这样他就能学会服从了。”
languages.original_text: "Death is the Emperor's Peace, and it must be earned. Let me turn him into a servitor on my ship. That will teach him obedience."

traits.locale_text: “死亡是帝皇赐予的安宁，只有努力争取才能得到。我会把他改造成奴工，让他在我的船上服役，这样他就能学会服从了。”

languages.text: 「死は皇帝陛下の安らぎであり、努力した者のみが得られるものだ。{mf|俺|私}の船で彼をサーヴィターにしよう。きっと、服従を学ぶだろう」
languages.original_text: "Death is the Emperor's Peace, and it must be earned. Let me turn him into a servitor on my ship. That will teach him obedience."

traits.locale_text: 「死は皇帝陛下の安らぎであり、努力した者のみが得られるものだ。{mf|俺|私}の船で彼をサーヴィターにしよう。きっと、服従を学ぶだろう」

languages.text: «La muerte es la Paz del Emperador y debe ser ganada. Déjeme convertirlo en un servidor de mi nave. Eso le enseñará a obedecer».
languages.original_text: "Death is the Emperor's Peace, and it must be earned. Let me turn him into a servitor on my ship. That will teach him obedience."

traits.locale_text: «La muerte es la Paz del Emperador y debe ser ganada. Déjeme convertirlo en un servidor de mi nave. Eso le enseñará a obedecer».

languages.text: "Der Tod ist der Friede des Imperators, und man muss ihn sich verdienen. Lasst ihn mich zu einem Servitoren auf meinem Schiff machen. Das wird ihn Gehorsam lehren."
languages.original_text: "Death is the Emperor's Peace, and it must be earned. Let me turn him into a servitor on my ship. That will teach him obedience."

traits.locale_text: "Der Tod ist der Friede des Imperators, und man muss ihn sich verdienen. Lasst ihn mich zu einem Servitoren auf meinem Schiff machen. Das wird ihn Gehorsam lehren."

languages.text: « La mort est la paix de l'Empereur, et elle se mérite. Laissez-moi faire de lui un servitor à bord de mon vaisseau, ça lui apprendra à obéir. »
languages.original_text: "Death is the Emperor's Peace, and it must be earned. Let me turn him into a servitor on my ship. That will teach him obedience."

traits.locale_text: « La mort est la paix de l'Empereur, et elle se mérite. Laissez-moi faire de lui un servitor à bord de mon vaisseau, ça lui apprendra à obéir. »

languages.text: "Ölüm, İmparator'un Huzuru'dur ve kazanılmalıdır. Onu gemimde hizmetöre çevireyim. Bu, ona itaat etmeyi öğretecektir."
languages.original_text: "Death is the Emperor's Peace, and it must be earned. Let me turn him into a servitor on my ship. That will teach him obedience."

traits.locale_text: "Ölüm, İmparator'un Huzuru'dur ve kazanılmalıdır. Onu gemimde bir hizmetöre çevireyim. Bu ona itaat etmeyi öğretecektir."
